gw.cc.financials.entity

Interface TransactionEditWrapper


  • public interface TransactionEditWrapper
    TransactionEditWrapper

    • Method Summary

      Gets the value of Transaction.OverrideTransToReservingExchangeRate
      void setCurrency(Currency c)
      Sets the value of Transaction.Currency and updates the internal reserving amount property based on the transaction amount and the new exchange rate.

      Sets the value of Transaction.TransToReservingExchangeRateRate and updates the internal reserving amount property based on the transaction amount and the new exchange rate.

      Sets the value of Transaction.OverrideTransToReservingExchangeRate and updates the internal reserving amount property based on the transaction amount and the new exchange rate.

    • Method Detail

      • getNewAmountInReservingCurrency

        IMutableMoney getNewAmountInReservingCurrency()
        Gets an IMutableMoney to be used for editing the amount in the reserving currency. When the amount is mutated, the amount is saved to the internal reserving amount and transaction amount properties, and the Transaction's currency is set to it's reserving currency.
        Returns:
        an IMutableMoney to be used for modifying the amount in the reserving currency

      • getNewAmountInTransactionCurrency

        IMutableMoney getNewAmountInTransactionCurrency()
        Gets an IMutablePairedMoney to be used for editing the amount in the transaction currency. The secondary amount is equal to the internal reserving amount.
        Returns:
        an IMutablePairedMoney to be used for modifying the amount in the transaction currency in the UI

      • getOverrideExchangeRate

        boolean getOverrideExchangeRate()
        Gets the value of Transaction.OverrideTransToReservingExchangeRate
        Returns:
        the value of Transaction.OverrideTransToReservingExchangeRate

      • setOverrideExchangeRate

        void setOverrideExchangeRate(boolean o)
        Sets the value of Transaction.OverrideTransToReservingExchangeRate and updates the internal reserving amount property based on the transaction amount and the new exchange rate.

      • getExchangeRateRate

        java.math.BigDecimal getExchangeRateRate()
        Gets the value of Transaction.TransToReservingExchangeRateRate
        Returns:
        the value of Transaction.TransToReservingExchangeRateRate

      • setExchangeRateRate

        void setExchangeRateRate(java.math.BigDecimal r)
        Sets the value of Transaction.TransToReservingExchangeRateRate and updates the internal reserving amount property based on the transaction amount and the new exchange rate.

      • getCurrency

        Currency getCurrency()
        Gets the value of Transaction.Currency
        Returns:
        the value of Transaction.Currency

      • setCurrency

        void setCurrency(Currency c)
        Sets the value of Transaction.Currency and updates the internal reserving amount property based on the transaction amount and the new exchange rate.
